original_text:
Then they will cry to the Lord,
    but he will not answer them;
he will hide his face from them at that time,
    because they have made their deeds evil.
korean_text: 그 때에 그들이 여호와께 부르짖을지라도 응답하지 아니하시고 그들의 행위가 악했던 만큼 그들 앞에 얼굴을 가리시리라

sentences.original_text: Then they will cry to the Lord,
but he will not answer them;
he will hide his face from them at that time,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 때에 그들에게서 자기 얼굴을 숨기실 것이며,

sentences.original_text: because they have made their deeds evil.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그들이 그 행위를 악하게 만들었음이니라.
